plot: Jeremy tests the Mercedes-Benz CLS55 AMG. James road tests the Honda Element. Richard and James have a game of car football using the Toyota Aygo. Jeremy test the Land Rover Range Rover Sport by trying to avoid getting shot by a Challenger II tank.—Caboose

Jeremy reviews the Mercedes-Benz CLS55 AMG. James and Richard play football with teams of Toyota Aygo cars. Jeremy tries to avoid being killed by a Challenger 2 tank on Salisbury Plain when he takes the new Range Rover Sport off-road. James Nesbitt is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots
